info.title: Bookaway Oauth
info.description:
The Client Credentials Grant allows an application to request an Access Token using its Client Id and Client Secret.

The access token expiration is stated in the response and the client should get a new token before the current one expires.

The access token should be included on all calls to the Bookaway server as a bearer token on the Authorisation header.

post.description: In exchange for your API credentials (client_id and client_secret), Bookaway authorization server will return a response containing a signed JSON Web Token (JWT), the token's type (which is Bearer), and in how much time it expires in Unix time (86400 seconds, which means 24 hours).

client_id.description: The client_id you received upon registering to Bookaway B2B API

client_secret.description: The client_secret you received upon registering to Bookaway B2B API
